204 // Return the type of the body
208 inline BodyType CollisionBody::getType() const {
209  return mType;
210 }
211 
212 // Return the current position and orientation
217 inline const Transform& CollisionBody::getTransform() const {
218  return mTransform;
219 }
220 
221 // Return the first element of the linked list of contact manifolds involving this body
226 inline const ContactManifoldListElement* CollisionBody::getContactManifoldsList() const {
227  return mContactManifoldsList;
228 }
229 
230 // Return the linked list of proxy shapes of that body
235 inline ProxyShape* CollisionBody::getProxyShapesList() {
236  return mProxyCollisionShapes;
237 }
238 
239 // Return the linked list of proxy shapes of that body
244 inline const ProxyShape* CollisionBody::getProxyShapesList() const {
245  return mProxyCollisionShapes;
246 }
247 
248 // Return the world-space coordinates of a point given the local-space coordinates of the body
253 inline Vector3 CollisionBody::getWorldPoint(const Vector3& localPoint) const {
254  return mTransform * localPoint;
255 }
256 
257 // Return the world-space vector of a vector given in local-space coordinates of the body
262 inline Vector3 CollisionBody::getWorldVector(const Vector3& localVector) const {
263  return mTransform.getOrientation() * localVector;
264 }
265 
266 // Return the body local-space coordinates of a point given in the world-space coordinates
271 inline Vector3 CollisionBody::getLocalPoint(const Vector3& worldPoint) const {
272  return mTransform.getInverse() * worldPoint;
273 }
274 
275 // Return the body local-space coordinates of a vector given in the world-space coordinates
280 inline Vector3 CollisionBody::getLocalVector(const Vector3& worldVector) const {
281  return mTransform.getOrientation().getInverse() * worldVector;
282 }
283 
285 
289 inline bool CollisionBody::testAABBOverlap(const AABB& worldAABB) const {
290  return worldAABB.testCollision(getAABB());
291 }
292 
293 #ifdef IS_PROFILING_ACTIVE
294 
295 // Set the profiler
296 inline void CollisionBody::setProfiler(Profiler* profiler) {
297  mProfiler = profiler;
298 }
299 
300 #endif
301 
302 }
303 
304 #endif
